Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory107.png'}
{3: 'A woman draped in a pristine white cloak walks into the dimly lit base.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "...It's been a while.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her gaze falls upon the red egg placed beneath the small Tree of Life.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Forgive my uninvited appearance. You\'ve obtained the <phonetic=Hetero Tower>"key"</phonetic>, haven\'t you?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "Yes, she's about to hatch.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The spindle-shaped "egg" pulsates slowly, beating like a human heart.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "So, the key. Would it be safe to see it as that commandant's... daughter?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "I'd say the key is more like the actual commandant.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "The introduction didn't go well. The memories and consciousness aren't entirely complete. I saw several shards that belonged to others.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Perhaps it could already be considered a complete "return ticket".', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The man lets out a soft sigh, seemingly dissatisfied with the current state of things.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Why did you choose this commandant when anyone with a stable M.I.N.D. can be the core of the key?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her question seems directed at more than just Vonnegut.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'I need someone who understands the cost of power.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "The <phonetic=change>key</phonetic> isn't just a tool. She possesses her own consciousness. Having to go down the same path again and again is torturing, and few have what it takes to stand that.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Most people use this power to satisfy their own desires once they realize what they are capable of.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'And we both know what can happen when that happens.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'He also turns his gaze toward the pulsating "egg".'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Only this commandant...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: '...has what it takes to become the perfect "<phonetic=change>key</phonetic>". Unfortunately...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Making the "real" commandant serve as the "key" is no simple task, and besides...'}
{3: 'The agent lowers his head, staring at his palm.'}
{3: 'Throughout countless cycles, he has made desperate attempts before, but the results always fell short of expectations.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'I\'ve tried using the "real" commandant as the "key", but the results were less than ideal.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'What I need is "future", not playing along with their happy ending charade.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I wish the best of luck to you and your new key with passing through the door.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Sensing Vonnegut's penetrating gaze, Ishmael offers an intentionally ambiguous explanation."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I don\'t wish for these developments to be erased. What I truly look forward to is witnessing the "rules" being shattered.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "So, I won't obstruct your actions... whether you're Ascendants or humans.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "If you're referring to the struggle between humans and the Punishing Virus, I don't really care which side emerges victorious.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "You're far less interesting than when you were still alive, Professor... so much so that I barely recognize you now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Are you still merging those "voices"?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He instinctively touches his mask, pauses, and tacitly acknowledges the statement.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "You're nearly forgetting who you are. You might be able to get out of the closed loop of time now, but you're no longer the same person that you were.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Even if you obtain the "key", have you envisioned your ending?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ishmael studies the agent with an inquisitive gaze.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "That doesn't matter.", 4: '2'}
{3: "The man's voice remains composed, unfazed by Ishmael's brief dismissal."}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Regardless of the outcome, this path is exactly the one I set out to take.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'And it won\'t be so "uninteresting" for you either, right?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The two both fall silent, no longer conversing.'}
{3: '"Thump—Thump—"'}
{3: 'The "egg\'s" heartbeat grows increasingly rapid, like a nestling unable to break through its shell—restless, struggling to find its way out.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Ah... unable to find her "self"?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She sweeps her cloak aside and holds the egg in her arms.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Should we give her a name? Giving her an identity, providing information—it can help her hatch sooner.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'How about...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She gives a peculiar smile.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'We call her 【kuroname】?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Tiny cracks appear on the egg's shell."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "That's a terrible joke, madam.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The dark figure stares at the egg about to hatch, briefly lost in thought.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "Chaos—let's stick with that for the time being until she names herself.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'In silence, the shell of the egg gradually cracks...'}
{3: 'She seems to hear something, giving a knowing smile.'}
{3: 'Within the small Tree of Life, the <phonetic=Chaos>Hetero-Creature</phonetic> slowly opens her eyes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'So this is... your choice.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The agent gazes at the hatched Hetero-Creature, seemingly lost in thought.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "What's wrong? Not happy with it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Isn't this... the result you wanted?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lifting the young Hetero-Creature from the now-shattered "egg", Ishmael gently wraps her in her cloak.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: '...This is quite unexpected.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Chaos before him is clearly more complete than he anticipated...'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Vonnegut remains silent, unsure whether this development is beneficial or detrimental to his plans.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'A stable consciousness is certainly better than an unstable one.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'The key is quite complete... Perhaps she truly can become a nearly perfect "return ticket".', 4: '1'}
{3: "Gazing down at Chaos in her arms, Ishmael gently brushes the hair on the little Hetero-Creature's forehead."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Since the result meets your expectations...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Would you mind sharing what your original plan was?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No emotion visible in his golden eyes, Vonnegut pauses for a moment before slowly speaking.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'I will take Chaos into the Hetero Tower.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'He searches repeatedly through his memories, looking for the corresponding "plan".'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "Dominik's plan is a pipe dream. You and I both know that the contaminating memetic can never be truly sealed away.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Only by addressing the problem from its <color=#ff4e4eff>source</color> can we truly break everything apart.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'After you enter the Hetero Tower... then what?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "I'm not sure either.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "You won't tell me what the current situation is inside the Hetero Tower, will you?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Ishmael makes a polite sound of acknowledgment.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "I'm sorry, but I indeed cannot.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'The interior of the Hetero Tower is too chaotic. After it was twisted by that Construct, I can no longer fathom what exactly has happened in there.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'It could be the entangled Golden Age, or maybe a space submerged by the Red Tide, or even...'}
{3: 'He might come face to face with visitors from a new civilization after entering.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'But in any case... the key is more complete now, which is at least something positive.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She attempts to hand Chaos over to Vonnegut, but the pale doll instinctively furrows her brow the moment she sees him.'}
{3: 'Handing Chaos along with the cloak to Vonnegut, Ishmael softly chuckles.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "A nearly perfect return ticket... Perhaps this time, you'll succeed?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Taking the fragile doll, Vonnegut bows his head, gazing at this key hatched from the culmination of all his power.'}
{3: 'She represents more than just success in a single gambit...'}
{3: 'She is also the pass that determines whether he can completely break free from the time loop.'}
{3: 'He has walked alone in this closed loop for too long—so long that... he has forgotten who he was at the very beginning.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'How long has it been now...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Do you need me to tell you the exact figures?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "...No, thank you. I don't actually want to know.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Gazing at the doll in his hands, for the first time in a long while, he recalls memories from the distant past without consulting his notebook.'}
{3: 'If he can really make it this time...'}
{3: 'Maybe then he can finally return to the place he once called home, rediscovering the path that is truly his own...'}
{3: 'He has grown weary of failure and refuses to fail again.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Time's almost up, and now that I've learned your choice...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'This is farewell.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Just as suddenly as she appeared, Ishmael quietly vanishes once more.'}
{3: 'Sometime later, Lithos enters through the doorway and shakes his head at Vonnegut.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lithos', 3: "Mister, I didn't see how the lady left.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He is not surprised by this result.'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'She... has hatched.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Lithos notices the Hetero-Creature in the man's hands and cautiously attempts to approach."}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Her name is Chaos.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopRed.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The pale doll stares indifferently at the agent before her.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopRed.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Your name... is Chaos.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vonnegut addresses the petite doll with noticeable awkwardness.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lithos', 3: 'Is that consciousness still inside her, Mister?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "I'm not sure.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The agent lets out a sigh.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Her completeness is beyond my imagination. Probably something unexpected has happened.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'But the breeding process was complete, with no abnormal data detected.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lithos stares fixedly at Chaos in the agent\'s arms—she is... the "child" that hatched from that egg.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Maybe... it happened somewhere beyond our notice.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'His deep golden eyes study the petite Hetero-Creature.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Tell me, who are you?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab', 2: '2'}

{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The "gaze" higher than Chaos observes everything here.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopRed.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 4: '5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4801_23.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4801_23.jpg', 3: '0.3', 4: '4'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Strange shadows whisper in the corners, their chaotic murmurs constantly pouring into the M.I.N.D.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory772.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory775.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory776.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3901_29.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3901_25.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Chaos... Hetero-Creature... Egg...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopRed.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory107.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Fragments of memories slowly resurface, unveiling the world like silk unwinding from a cocoon, revealing everything once more before you.'}
{3: 'Just as Ishmael said, Vonnegut cannot fully control Chaos\' will. Everything about "her" seems to be under your control.'}
{3: 'Or rather...'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopRed.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1119.jpg'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'When "you" become the true "Chaos", you will reign over everything within Chaos.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Your "sight" will transcend Chaos.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Your "sight" will exist beyond just this realm, preventing Vonnegut from manipulating your thoughts.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopRed.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory107.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Tell me, who are you?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Vonnegut repeats the question sharply and persistently, as if trying to discern some clue from Chaos' indifferent eyes."}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'What do you remember?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Gray Raven... Babylonia... 【kuroname】...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He utters one word after another, probing her responses.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopRed.prefab'}
{1: '1', 3: "There isn't the slightest reaction to those words. The petite Hetero-Creature remains expressionless, just like an actual doll."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lithos', 3: 'Does she really have consciousness, Mister?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Observing Vonnegut's somewhat gloomy expression, Lithos hesitates for a moment before speaking softly."}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'From what we\'ve seen with past test subjects, those without implanted memories wouldn\'t have any "memories" to speak of.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'She should have no self-awareness.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He shakes his head.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "She's too complete. I find it hard to believe that a Hetero-Creature fused with the memories of that commandant would remember absolutely nothing.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Back then... are you sure there was nothing usual about that cloned commandant?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lithos recalls everything that has happened at the bottom of the sea.'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'There was nothing usual, Mister.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'Everything has been proceeding according to your plan. All escaped subjects have been recycled by the Sea Fairies. So, there was nothing usual, Mister.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'The cradle has remained stable, and all data shows no issues.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'I saw the birth of her egg with my own eyes.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lithos states all this with unwavering certainty.'}
{3: 'The dark figure contemplates in silence.'}
{3: "He doesn't believe Chaos is completely without memories, but so far, she hasn't displayed any abnormal behavior."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lithos', 3: 'Mister, what are we going to do next?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The boy looks up at Vonnegut.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "...We're out of time.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He cradles the crimson doll in his arms.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'There have been changes in the Hetero Tower. I suspect... the "Anomaly" has noticed this world.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'The Anomaly...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'We must proceed with the next phase of our plan.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The Hetero Tower is now encased in layered crystals, and the path of "return" has vanished.'}
{3: 'He has been trapped in this closed loop for too long, and now his only option is to shatter this time cycle—'}
{3: 'Embracing his final <phonetic=Chaos>hope</phonetic>, Vonnegut departs from the base.'}
